Package org.example

Class DBConnections

java.lang.Object
org.example.DBConnections
public class DBConnections extends Object
This class connects to the SQLite DB that contains all the songs, artists, and albums information.

      Parameters:

      Retrieves all the artists that exist within the SQLite DB
      Returns:
      an Arraylist of String containing all artist names in the DB

      Retrieves all the albums that exist within the SQLite DB
      Returns:
      an Arraylist of String containing all album names in the DB

    • addNewSong

      public static boolean addNewSong(Song song)
      Adds a Song object to the SQLite DB
      Parameters:
      song - the Song object to be added to the DB
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating whether the INSERT operation is successful or not

    • findArtist

      public static Artist findArtist(int audioDBID)
      Finds whether an artist exists in the SQLite DB based on AudioDB ID
      Parameters:
      audioDBID - an Integer representing the AudioDB ID of the artist
      Returns:
      an Artist object containing the requested artist
